abilities.name: α Recovery
abilities.effect: When this Pokémon is healed, double the amount healed.

attacks.name: Tail Rap
attacks.effect: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 30 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Dwindling Wave
attacks.effect: This attack does 100 damage minus 10 damage for each damage counter on this Pokémon.
